revised_title: An Element of Strength in Beams Subjected to Transverse Strain: Appendix
tldr: This article is an appendix to a paper by W.H. Barlow on the element of strength in beams subjected to transverse strain. Peter Barlow, the author, provides additional information and insights into the topic. The research focuses on understanding the strength and behavior of beams under stress, which is essential for structural engineering and material science.
